COVID-19 Data Hub

Funded by the Institute for Data Valorization IVADO, Canada.

The goal of COVID-19 Data Hub is to provide the research community with a unified data hub by collecting worldwide fine-grained case data, merged with exogenous variables helpful for a better understanding of COVID-19.

You are welcome to join and extend the number of supporting data sources as a joint effort against COVID-19. Join us on Slack to get help, contribute on GitHub and earn a badge.

Authors
